about_the_game:
About ChessFinity

ChessFinity introduces a modern twist to a classic game. Expanding chess into the third dimension and supporting 3+ players, it offers an array of game modes, player customisation options, and online or local multiplayer. Whether you're a chess veteran or new to the game, ChessFinity provides a flexible platform for strategic gameplay.

Core Features at Launch:

3D Chess Gameplay with Support for 3+ Players

Experience chess across multiple layers with verticality in gameplay. Play in classic 1v1 duels, team-based matches, or even larger free-for-all games in local or online multiplayer. ChessFinity gives you new dimensions—literally and figuratively—to explore.



Classic Chess and Variants

Enjoy standard chess or explore different modes, including Fischer Random (Chess960). Classic chess remains central, but players can engage in new challenges through a variety of pre-set variants.

Modifiable Boards and Rules

ChessFinity allows you to modify key elements of the game. Adjust board dimensions, toggle obstacles, or set custom starting positions. You can even introduce unique pieces with specialised movements, offering players control over their chess experience. Every match can be customised to suit different preferences and playstyles.

Mana Chess: A Strategy Card Game Hybrid

In Mana Chess, each turn introduces a new layer of strategy. Players draw chess piece cards from a deck and spend mana to place them onto the board, adding an element of unpredictability akin to card games. This mode combines traditional chess tactics with the excitement of a deck-building game.

Asynchronous Play for All Modes
Don’t have time for a live game? ChessFinity supports asynchronous play, allowing you to take your moves when it's convenient. All game modes include this option, so you can enjoy a more flexible gaming experience.

Future Updates

ChessFinity is a constantly evolving platform. Future updates will introduce Simultaneous Chess, where all players make their moves at the same time, creating fast-paced, high-intensity matches. Additional custom pieces, new rulesets, and interactive mechanics based on player feedback will keep the game fresh.

Player-Controlled Variant Hub
Create and explore custom chess experiences in the Variant Hub. Toggle features like fog of war, obstacles, and mana pools to build unique matches. Whether you're adjusting board layouts or introducing new mechanics, you have full control over the gameplay.

A New Perspective on Chess

ChessFinity is designed to broaden how chess can be played. Whether you prefer the standard game or want to explore new mechanics, ChessFinity offers endless replayability for both casual players and dedicated strategists. Wishlist today and join our Discord community to stay updated on upcoming features, tournaments, and more.
